title: Anthropic executive takes a thinly-veiled swipe at OpenAI over spending and ads
summary_full: "We've made less flashy headlines than some, and we've been focused on growing revenue and winning business," Anthropic's chief commercial officer told CNBC.
summary_public: "We've made less flashy headlines than some, and we've been focused on growing revenue and winning business," Anthropic's chief commercial officer told CNBC.
